Package com.hybris.services.entitlements.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Validator
    Interface for definition class-mapped validators.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConversionStrategy<T>
    This class validates that parameters passed as strings can be converted to particular type.
    ActionTypeValidator
    Validates execution actions.
    BatchExecutionValidatorData
    Validates parameters of batch execution.
    BooleanConversionStrategy
    Boolean type validator.
    CheckActionTypeValidator
    Allows only CHECK or NULL execution actions.
    ConditionDataListValidator
    The ConditionDataListValidator.
    ConditionDataValidator
    This class extends Spring validator for CriterionData.
    CriterionDataValidator
    Validates single instance of CriterionData.
    DateTimeConversionStrategy
    Date time validator.
    ExecutionValidatorData
    Helper class to provide validation rules for grant execution.
    GeoPathConversionStrategy
    Validates geoPath string in special format for both granting and checking an entitlement.
    GrantPropertyValidator
    Facade input data validation.
    IntegerConversionStrategy
    Positive number validator.
    PositiveIntegerConversionStrategy
    Numeric validator.
    PropertyDataValidator
    PropertyData validator.
    ValidationExecutor
    Spring validation does not work as desired.
    ValidationViolations
    Container of validation issues.
    Violation
    Single validation error message.
